ValidationRule.description: When the Project Units are "Calendar Allocations" or "Estimated Hours" the Estimated Hours field is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: /*Unless the Units value is "Duration" the Estimated Hours is required*/ ISBLANK(project_cloud__Estimated_Hours__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Units__c, "Duration"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Units for this Project Task require an Estimated Hours value to be defined
